concept.title: Currency
concept.shortdesc: Currency is the common name of all of the in-game non-equipable items that are dropped by killing monsters. Currency can be used to buy items from the NPC vendors, for trades with the other players in game, and for crafting. Some currency types have specific functions like opening portals or identifying an item.

p.b: The currency type used for crafting is Orbs.

conbody.p: Orbs can be dropped in any area, but each orb type has a different chance of dropping. Some are very common, others are very rare or may be dropped only by a boss. The character's level, the area level, or other factors like map enchantment or gear attributes can also influence the drop chance.
